titleInfo.title: Diorite statue of King Khafre, builder of Second Pyramid of Gizeh, Cairo, Egypt

mods.abstract: Diorite sculpture of the Pharaoh Khafre at the National Museum of Egypt in Giza, Egypt.

Khafre was an Egyptian Pharoah during the 4th dynasty and builder of the second of three Pyramids of Giza. Son of Khufu and and Queen Henutsen, he succeeded his half brother Djedefre. Khufu built the Great Pyramid, but Khafre's is built higher on the Giza plateau so it looks larger.
